history.narrative: Law 17-81, the “Neighborhood Investment Amendment Act of 2007”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-181 which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 2, 2007, and November 6, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 26, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-192 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-81 became effective on January 29, 2008.
